com.qtplaf.library.database

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.database.View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>

    public class View
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
    An SQL database view, build with a master table and relations. When defining a view, fields must belong to tables of the relations or be non persistent.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(java.lang.Object o)
        Compares this table with the argument table. Returns 0 if they are equal, -1 if this value is less than the argument, and 1 if it is greater. A table is considered to be equal to another table in the context of a SELECT statement.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
        Parameters:
        o - The object to compare with.
        Returns:
        An int
